plugins.name: trade-law
plugins.description: Research-grade U.S. customs classification and trade compliance assistant for licensed attorneys and customs brokers. Produces structured draft work product across the full import compliance pipeline — systematic GRI 1-6 tariff analysis, CROSS ruling research, CIT/CAFC decision briefing, complete duty compilation with Chapter 99 surcharges, country of origin determination, and end-to-end compliance review — with enforced authority hierarchy, confidence scoring, and human review triggers.
